# Property Keys

**API Collection**

These keys correspond to the extension item properties and are specified in the extension’s `Info.plist`.

## Constants

- **NSExtensionItemAttributedTitleKey**: An optional title of the extension item.
- **NSExtensionItemAttributedContentTextKey**: An optional string describing the extension item content.
- **NSExtensionItemAttachmentsKey**: An optional array of media data associated with the extension item.

## Constants

- **UTI Subtypes for Data Detector Types**: These constants represent sub-Uniform Type Identifier of `com.apple.structured-text`

items.description: An optional title of the extension item.
items.name: NSExtensionItemAttributedTitleKey

items.description: An optional string describing the extension item content.
